metadata.consumer: Protocol 02 (Client Discovery Initiation), Protocol 03 (Project Brief Creation)

primary_objectives: Deliver production-ready, compliance-audited zero-trust payments orchestration MVP
Create operational runbooks for internal team autonomy

key_deliverables.description: Threat model, trust boundaries, PQ migration plan, data residency matrix
Terraform/Pulumi with drift detection and compliance guardrails
OPA/Rego + Cedar with automated test fixtures
Orchestration engine, FX netting, compliance engine, zero-trust access plane
PQ key exchange, attestation checks, identity ledger
Multi-region failover, sanction rules, policy enforcement
Quantum failback, SWIFT CSP audit prep, MAS TRM escalation, PQ key rotation
Sigstore attestations, in-toto metadata, FedLine checklist, policy drift dashboards
Comprehensive validation, knowledge transfer, operational readiness

technical_scope.cicd: GitHub Actions, in-toto, Sigstore, Terraform, Pulumi

in_scope: Compliance framework (SWIFT CSP, MAS TRM, FedLine, PSD2 RTS)
out_of_scope: Full production scale (requires additional capacity planning)
All clearing partner integrations (focus on 2-3 priority corridors)
Hardware HSM deployment (interim secure enclave strategy)
Complete PQ migration (legacy TLS 1.2 bridge required)

key_constraints.mitigation: Secure enclave (AWS Nitro/GCP Confidential Computing) with HSM migration plan
TLS 1.2 bridge with PQ enforcement and downgrade detection
Agile protocol adaptation with weekly compliance checkpoint

methodology.description: 28-protocol SDLC with quality gates and evidence packages

proof_artifacts.description: 28-protocol SDLC framework with quality gates and evidence packages
Multi-region zero-trust architecture for financial services

communication_plan.daily: Async updates via Slack/Teams with progress evidence
communication_plan.weekly: Steering committee sync (60 min) for milestone reviews
communication_plan.bi_weekly: Technical deep-dives with architecture and compliance teams
communication_plan.ad_hoc: Rapid response for regulatory changes or critical blockers

acceptance_criteria: PQ handshake fallback alarms within 200ms with regulator evidence
Least-privilege enforcement via automated attack simulations
Data residency validation through synthetic flow tests
FX reconciliation penny-perfect accuracy across 3 currencies
Operational SRE drills proving recovery procedures

action_items_before_submission: Replace placeholder GitHub links with actual repository URLs
Insert actual contact information (email, calendar, LinkedIn, GitHub)
